meanings.sent1: The unarmed soldier bravely faced the enemy.
meanings.sent2: The police officer approached the suspect unarmed.
meanings.sent3: The unarmed squirrel challenged the cat to a staring contest.
meanings.sent4: Her words were her only unarmed weapon in the debate.
meanings.sent5: The unarmed knight relied on his shield for protection.

meanings.sent1: The unarmed protestor peacefully marched for change.

meanings.sent4: His unarmed approach to problem-solving impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The unarmed diplomat skillfully navigated the tense situation.

meanings.sent1: The unarmed village was vulnerable to attacks.
meanings.sent2: The explorer ventured into the jungle unarmed.
